title: Readout of President Joseph R. Biden, Jr.’s Call with President Emmanuel Macron of France | The White House
content: President Joseph R. Biden, Jr. spoke today with President Emmanuel Macron of France. The leaders discussed ongoing diplomatic and deterrence efforts in response to Russia’s continued military build-up on Ukraine’s borders, and affirmed their support for Ukraine’s sovereignty and territorial integrity. They agreed their teams will remain in touch and continue consulting with our Allies and partners, including Ukraine.###
